title: Watford defender Jose Holebas signs new contract until 2020
description: Defender Jose Holebas has signed a new contract that commits him to Watford until the summer of 2020.
content: The 33-year-old has been a regular in the Hornets' defence this season having joined from Olympiakos for Â£1.8m in July 2015.He has made 63 appearances in total for Watford, scoring two goals including a 'Goal of the Season' contender at Middlesbrough last season.Holebas spent a season on loan at Roma for a season before moving to Watford in 2015.He has featured in 15 of the Hornets' 22 Premier League games this term, with the club currently 10th in the standings.
